title: Hladno Pivo
description:
One of the biggest Croatian band of today and probably the biggest one outside Croatia when it comes to former Yugoslavia Hladno Pivo, Cold Beer in English, has since the first cd 1993 till today kept on delivering hits never compromised with their happy punk style with lots of influences from the old school punk and bands like Ramones. From the first hit, Fur ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¼mer punk, a remake of die Goldenen Zitronen song, to their biggest hit Zimmer Frei they made something that hasn't happened since the golden age of Bijelo Dugme, to sell out gigs where ever they went in former Yugoslavia. 2003 they got the Croatian Helsinki Association prize for their fight against domestic violence specially thru their cd Samar, Slap.

This are all the official releases of the band:

Dzinovski 1993
G.A.D. 1995
Desetka 1997
Pobjeda 1999
Istocno od Gajnica 2000
Samar 2003
Knjiga Zalbe 2007
